messages.content: Welcome to the Adaptive Quizzing System, Frodo!

How is black horseman related to Master Peregrin & Others (Characters)?

feedback.message: Hmm, not quite so, my friend. Even the wisest cannot see all ends.
feedback.explanation: The ancient records of Gondor show that  is bound to the realm of Master Peregrin & Others (Characters), as written in the scrolls of lore.
next_steps: Do not be disheartened. Even Aragorn son of Arathorn had much to learn before claiming his throne.
Consider how the threads of fate bind these elements together, like the fellowship that united against the shadow.

messages.content:
Hmm, not quite so, my friend. Even the wisest cannot see all ends.

The ancient records of Gondor show that  is bound to the realm of Master Peregrin & Others (Characters), as written in the scrolls of lore.

- Do not be disheartened. Even Aragorn son of Arathorn had much to learn before claiming his throne.
- Consider how the threads of fate bind these elements together, like the fellowship that united against the shadow.
